p:
Without spin–orbit coupling, there is a single threefold degenerate (without accounting for spin) node at the
Γ
point, with wave functions transforming under symmetry operations of a little space group according to three-dimensional single-valued representation
Γ 4
, using notations from Ref. [ 82]. In Refs. [ 3, 4], low-energy excitations at this node are called “spin-1 fermions”. Without SOC, the topological charge of this node is equal to −2.
